content.rendered:
2022 Indy 500 Hotels & Accommodations

Roadtrips offers some of the best downtown accommodations available in Indianapolis. From the luxurious Conrad Hotel, to the Sheraton Indianapolis City Centre and Staybridge Suites, there are a variety of hotels to choose from, all located downtown, with easy access to Indianapolis’ best dining, shopping and attractions.
